summary: The Bicycle Commuter Act of 2025 amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand employer-provided fringe benefits for bicycle commuting. It reinstates and expands tax exclusions for qualified bicycle commuting benefits, including reimbursements for purchasing, leasing, and maintaining bicycles, electric bicycles, and certain scooters. It defines "qualified commuting property" and specifies limitations and effective dates for these changes, aiming to encourage bicycle commuting.
